dcterms:creator: M. Potthast
T. Gollub
K. Komlossy
S. Schuster
M. Wiegmann
E. Garces
M. Hagen
B. Stein
dcterms:description: A large corpus of tweets annotated for their clickbait nature, containing the title and text of the article along with supplementary information such as target description, target keywords, and linked images.
dcterms:title: Clickbait Dataset (tweets)

dcterms:creator: A. Chakraborty
B. Paranjape
S. Kakarla
N. Ganguly
dcterms:description: A dataset of news headlines collected from trusted sources to detect and prevent clickbait in online news media.
dcterms:title: News Headlines Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Biyani
K. Tsioutsiouliklis
J. Blackmer
dcterms:description: A dataset used for detecting clickbaits in news streams, focusing on the informality of articles.
dcterms:title: General Clickbait Dataset
